api_list.api_description: Retrieves all characters with options to sort and limit results.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of results returned.

api_list.api_description: Search the wiki using the OpenSearch protocol.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of search results to return.

query: Can you provide information about the characters from the Final Space series and also search Wikipedia to find related pages to Final Space?

api_list.api_description: Retrieves all episodes with options to sort and limit results.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of results returned.

api_list.api_description: Parses a wiki page and returns its HTML content.

required_parameters.name: page
required_parameters.description: Title of the page to parse.

optional_parameters.name: wiki
optional_parameters.description: The wiki endpoint to use. Defaults to English Wikipedia.

query: List all episodes of the Final Space TV show and parse the Wikipedia page about the series.

api_list.api_description: Retrieves a location by its ID.
Retrieve the list of Wikimedia sites and related information.

query: Provide details about a specific location from Final Space by its ID and list all Wikimedia sites.
